app.name: LexiconForge
app.description: AI-powered translation and content creation tool

descriptions.temperature: Controls randomness. Lower = more focused, higher = more creative
descriptions.top_p: Nucleus sampling. Use with low temperature for best results
descriptions.frequency_penalty: Penalizes repeated tokens. Positive = less repetition
descriptions.presence_penalty: Penalizes new topics. Positive = more focused on topic
descriptions.seed: For reproducible outputs. Leave empty for random generation

defaults.negativePrompt: low quality, blurry, distorted, text, watermark

descriptions.negativePrompt: Default text describing what you don't want in generated images
descriptions.guidanceScale: Balance between creativity (1.5) and prompt adherence (5.0)
descriptions.loraStrength: Strength of LoRA model influence on artistic style

negativePromptSuggestions: low quality, blurry, distorted, text, watermark
